original_title: Masters of the Martial Arts Presented by Wesley Snipes
overview: Special honoring the grand masters of the martial arts with guest stars from film and television, music performances, live demonstrations, competitions and tributes to Jackie Chan, Bennie "The Jet" Urquidez, Cynthia Rothrock, Billy Blanks, Ernie Reyes Sr., and Shaka Zulu.
title: Masters of the Martial Arts Presented by Wesley Snipes
